casebody.data:
Bridgett THOMAS and Gregory Booker
v.
Donald THOMAS and Go Auto Insurance Company No. 2018-C-0732 Supreme Court of Louisiana. September 14, 2018 Writ denied. CRICHTON, J., would grant and assigns reasons. CRICHTON, J., would grant and assigns reasons: I would grant the writ application of Donald Thomas and Go Auto Insurance Company, reverse the lower courts, and remand for new trial. In my view, this application falls squarely within a "gross departure from proper judicial proceedings" as set forth in La. Sup. Ct. Rule X, Sec. 1(a)(5).
